targets.query: SELECT LAST("cpu_count") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag <> 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT LAST("cpu_count") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/  AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT LAST("server_memory") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag <> 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT LAST("server_memory") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/  AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "sku" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  and  sku !='SQL Azure'  AND $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "sql_version" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "hardware_type" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND $timeFilter AND "hardware_type" != 'HYPERVISOR'

SELECT non_negative_derivative("read_latency_ms", 1s) / non_negative_derivative("reads", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("write_latency_ms", 1s)/non_negative_derivative("writes", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("writes", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY="sql_instance"
list.label: InstanceName
list.name: InstanceName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY="sql_instance"
